Class OneTurnCostModifier

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, HasDesc<CardCostModifierDesc>, Trigger

    public final class OneTurnCostModifier
extends CardCostModifier
    A card cost modifier that lasts only one turn.
